title: robertcarlyle
author: robertcarlyle
content: How many people in the u.s. were wise enough to buy 1000 usd worth of bitcoin on January 1, 2011? Would January 1, 2011 been the only day in which if one bought this much bitcoin, one would have maxed out for this given amount? What about in 2010?
